DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim examine relative reinforce value ( RRV ) physical activity sedentary behavior predictor substitution physical activity sedentary behavior sedentary behavior reduce . The investigator predict significant positive relationship RRV substitution physical activity sedentary behavior sedentary behavior reduce . The investigator also predict significant positive relationship reduction sedentary behavior energy intake dietary fat .
DOC.criteria: 85th BMI percentile reside one primary household engage least 18 hour sedentary behavior week
DOC.keyword: reduce sedentary behavior child increase physical activity
